name: UniformSpace.Completion.coe_zero
initialProofState:
α : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : UniformSpace α
inst✝ : Zero α
⊢ Eq (↑0) 0
decl:
@[norm_cast]
theorem UniformSpace.Completion.coe_zero [Zero α] : ((0 : α) : Completion α) = 0 :=
  rfl

name: UniformSpace.Completion.coe_neg
initialProofState:
α : Type u_3
inst✝² : UniformSpace α
inst✝¹ : AddGroup α
inst✝ : UniformAddGroup α
a : α
⊢ Eq (↑(Neg.neg a)) (Neg.neg ↑a)
decl:
@[norm_cast]
theorem coe_neg (a : α) : ((-a : α) : Completion α) = -a :=
  (map_coe uniformContinuous_neg a).symm

name: UniformSpace.Completion.coe_sub
initialProofState:
α : Type u_3
inst✝² : UniformSpace α
inst✝¹ : AddGroup α
inst✝ : UniformAddGroup α
a b : α
⊢ Eq (↑(HSub.hSub a b)) (HSub.hSub ↑a ↑b)
decl:
@[norm_cast]
theorem coe_sub (a b : α) : ((a - b : α) : Completion α) = a - b :=
  (map₂_coe_coe a b Sub.sub uniformContinuous_sub).symm

name: UniformSpace.Completion.coe_add
initialProofState:
α : Type u_3
inst✝² : UniformSpace α
inst✝¹ : AddGroup α
inst✝ : UniformAddGroup α
a b : α
⊢ Eq (↑(HAdd.hAdd a b)) (HAdd.hAdd ↑a ↑b)
decl:
@[norm_cast]
theorem coe_add (a b : α) : ((a + b : α) : Completion α) = a + b :=
  (map₂_coe_coe a b (· + ·) uniformContinuous_add).symm

name: UniformSpace.Completion.uniformAddGroup
initialProofState:
α : Type u_3
inst✝² : UniformSpace α
inst✝¹ : AddGroup α
inst✝ : UniformAddGroup α
⊢ UniformAddGroup (UniformSpace.Completion α)

name: UniformSpace.Completion.toCompl_apply
initialProofState:
α : Type u_3
inst✝² : UniformSpace α
inst✝¹ : AddGroup α
inst✝ : UniformAddGroup α
a✝ : α
⊢ Eq (UniformSpace.Completion.toCompl a✝) ↑a✝
decl:
/-- The map from a group to its completion as a group hom. -/
@[simps]
def toCompl : α →+ Completion α where
  toFun := (↑)
  map_add' := coe_add
  map_zero' := coe_zero

name: UniformSpace.Completion.continuous_toCompl
initialProofState:
α : Type u_3
inst✝² : UniformSpace α
inst✝¹ : AddGroup α
inst✝ : UniformAddGroup α
⊢ Continuous ⇑UniformSpace.Completion.toCompl
decl:
theorem continuous_toCompl : Continuous (toCompl : α → Completion α) :=
  continuous_coe α

name: UniformSpace.Completion.isDenseInducing_toCompl
initialProofState:
α : Type u_3
inst✝² : UniformSpace α
inst✝¹ : AddGroup α
inst✝ : UniformAddGroup α
⊢ IsDenseInducing ⇑UniformSpace.Completion.toCompl
decl:
theorem isDenseInducing_toCompl : IsDenseInducing (toCompl : α → Completion α) :=
  isDenseInducing_coe

name: AddMonoidHom.extension_coe
initialProofState:
α : Type u_3
β : Type u_4
inst✝⁷ : UniformSpace α
inst✝⁶ : AddGroup α
inst✝⁵ : UniformAddGroup α
inst✝⁴ : UniformSpace β
inst✝³ : AddGroup β
inst✝² : UniformAddGroup β
inst✝¹ : CompleteSpace β
inst✝ : T0Space β
f : AddMonoidHom α β
hf : Continuous ⇑f
a : α
⊢ Eq ((f.extension hf) ↑a) (f a)
decl:
theorem AddMonoidHom.extension_coe [CompleteSpace β] [T0Space β] (f : α →+ β)
    (hf : Continuous f) (a : α) : f.extension hf a = f a :=
  UniformSpace.Completion.extension_coe (uniformContinuous_addMonoidHom_of_continuous hf) a

name: AddMonoidHom.continuous_extension
initialProofState:
α : Type u_3
β : Type u_4
inst✝⁷ : UniformSpace α
inst✝⁶ : AddGroup α
inst✝⁵ : UniformAddGroup α
inst✝⁴ : UniformSpace β
inst✝³ : AddGroup β
inst✝² : UniformAddGroup β
inst✝¹ : CompleteSpace β
inst✝ : T0Space β
f : AddMonoidHom α β
hf : Continuous ⇑f
⊢ Continuous ⇑(f.extension hf)
decl:
@[continuity]
theorem AddMonoidHom.continuous_extension [CompleteSpace β] [T0Space β] (f : α →+ β)
    (hf : Continuous f) : Continuous (f.extension hf) :=
  UniformSpace.Completion.continuous_extension

name: AddMonoidHom.continuous_completion
initialProofState:
α : Type u_3
β : Type u_4
inst✝⁵ : UniformSpace α
inst✝⁴ : AddGroup α
inst✝³ : UniformAddGroup α
inst✝² : UniformSpace β
inst✝¹ : AddGroup β
inst✝ : UniformAddGroup β
f : AddMonoidHom α β
hf : Continuous ⇑f
⊢ Continuous ⇑(f.completion hf)
decl:
@[continuity]
theorem AddMonoidHom.continuous_completion (f : α →+ β) (hf : Continuous f) :
    Continuous (AddMonoidHom.completion f hf : Completion α → Completion β) :=
  continuous_map

name: AddMonoidHom.completion_coe
initialProofState:
α : Type u_3
β : Type u_4
inst✝⁵ : UniformSpace α
inst✝⁴ : AddGroup α
inst✝³ : UniformAddGroup α
inst✝² : UniformSpace β
inst✝¹ : AddGroup β
inst✝ : UniformAddGroup β
f : AddMonoidHom α β
hf : Continuous ⇑f
a : α
⊢ Eq ((f.completion hf) ↑a) ↑(f a)
decl:
theorem AddMonoidHom.completion_coe (f : α →+ β) (hf : Continuous f) (a : α) :
    AddMonoidHom.completion f hf a = f a :=
  map_coe (uniformContinuous_addMonoidHom_of_continuous hf) a

name: AddMonoidHom.completion_zero
initialProofState:
α : Type u_3
β : Type u_4
inst✝⁵ : UniformSpace α
inst✝⁴ : AddGroup α
inst✝³ : UniformAddGroup α
inst✝² : UniformSpace β
inst✝¹ : AddGroup β
inst✝ : UniformAddGroup β
⊢ Eq (AddMonoidHom.completion 0 ⋯) 0
decl:
theorem AddMonoidHom.completion_zero :
    AddMonoidHom.completion (0 : α →+ β) continuous_const = 0 := by
  ext x
  refine Completion.induction_on x ?_ ?_
  · apply isClosed_eq (AddMonoidHom.continuous_completion (0 : α →+ β) continuous_const)
    exact continuous_const
  · intro a
    simp [(0 : α →+ β).completion_coe continuous_const, coe_zero]

name: AddMonoidHom.completion_add
initialProofState:
α : Type u_3
inst✝⁵ : UniformSpace α
inst✝⁴ : AddGroup α
inst✝³ : UniformAddGroup α
γ : Type u_5
inst✝² : AddCommGroup γ
inst✝¹ : UniformSpace γ
inst✝ : UniformAddGroup γ
f g : AddMonoidHom α γ
hf : Continuous ⇑f
hg : Continuous ⇑g
⊢ Eq ((HAdd.hAdd f g).completion ⋯) (HAdd.hAdd (f.completion hf) (g.completion hg))
decl:
theorem AddMonoidHom.completion_add {γ : Type*} [AddCommGroup γ] [UniformSpace γ]
    [UniformAddGroup γ] (f g : α →+ γ) (hf : Continuous f) (hg : Continuous g) :
    AddMonoidHom.completion (f + g) (hf.add hg) =
    AddMonoidHom.completion f hf + AddMonoidHom.completion g hg := by
  have hfg := hf.add hg
  ext x
  refine Completion.induction_on x ?_ ?_
  · exact isClosed_eq ((f + g).continuous_completion hfg)
      ((f.continuous_completion hf).add (g.continuous_completion hg))
  · intro a
    simp [(f + g).completion_coe hfg, coe_add, f.completion_coe hf, g.completion_coe hg]
